original_title: ±2℃纪录片——台湾必须面对的真相
overview: This two part documentary film, "+ two degrees Celsius -- the Truth Formosa (Taiwan) Must Face" focuses on the effects of climate change in Formosa (Taiwan) produced by famed Formosan (Taiwanese) Television host Sisy Chen.
title: Plus or Minus Two Degrees Celsius: the Truth Formosa (Taiwan) Must Face
